title: Bring on the female superheroes!
description: Why is it so hard to find female superhero merchandise? In this passionate, sparkling talk, media studies scholar (and father of a Star Wars-obsessed daughter) Christopher Bell addresses the alarming lack of female superheroes in the toys and products marketed to kids -- and what it means for how we teach them about the world.
author: Christopher Bell
keywords: TED, talks, art, children, communication, identity, entertainment, film, inequality, marketing, parenting, media, society, TEDx, women, toy, movies
